data.title: Westfield Heritage Village, Hamilton
data.meta_description: Do you want to know the entry ticket price for Westfield Heritage Village? Opening & closing timings, parking options, restaurants nearby or what to see on your visit to Westfield Heritage Village? Click Now to check the details!
data.text:
Home to beautifully preserved historic buildings and reminiscent of times bygone, the Westfield Heritage Village is a magnificently restored heritage center. The motive of the village is to educate the public about early Canadian culture. Visitors can experience live history demonstrations and take part in guided tours of the 130-hectare site which is bordered by beautiful woodlands, meadows and trails. The volunteers and staff are dressed in period costume and were very knowledgeable about the property and its heritage. A number of special events take place here on a regular basis.

Entrance Ticket Details For Westfield Heritage Village

Entry by donation.

Restaurants

Wild Wing Cambridge

Cookhouse Bistro Inc

Quatrefoil Restaurant
